thread.title: Dhoni has been made a scapegoat, can play for another 3 to 5 years, says Sunil Gavaskar
thread.title_full: Dhoni has been made a scapegoat, can play for another 3 to 5 years, says Sunil Gavaskar - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Dhoni has been made a scapegoat, can play for another 3 to 5 years, says Sunil Gavaskar
text: Former Indian cricketer Sunil Gavaskar has defended the current captian Mahendra Singh Dhoni, saying that he has been made a scapegoat and can play for another three to five years. Â»
